name: RaySupreme Graph
summary: Learn about .RSG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can create a RSG file by following these steps:
In the menu bar, select File → Save As... OR select File → New OR click the floppy disk icon with the + sign and upward arrow on the RaySupreme program bar.
NOTE: BrainDistrict GmbH RaySupreme has been discontinued.

description: An RSG file is a graph created by RaySupreme, a 3D modeling and rendering program. It contains a RaySupreme 3D project graph. Each RSG file can be customized using many features, including a motion path tool, scale tool, world light settings, material template filter settings, camera settings, etc.
